description:
Sakura`s classmate and friend. She lacks of self-awareness and blind to the situation happen around her. Despite her rude tomboyish demeanor, she has an angelic singing voice thus giving her the nickname Vocal Club`s Lorelei (声楽部のローレライ). Lorelei`s identity is a secret known to Sakura and Nozaki only. She is often asked for help on various extracurricular activities.
Source: Wiki
name: Seo Yuzuki
